#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

long long calc(long long a, long long b){
	
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
		
	if(b==1)
		return a;
		
	long long temp = calc(a,b/2);
	
	if(b%2 == 0){
		return temp*temp;
	}
	else
		return a*temp*temp;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	
	while(test--){
	
	long long n;
	
	cin>>n;
	
	int m = 49;
	
	bool f =0;
	
	for(int i=2;i<= m; i++){
		
		double pthroot = pow(n, (double)1.0/(double)i);
		
		long long left = floor(pthroot);
		long long right = ceil(pthroot);
		
		long long ipower = calc(left,i);
		long long tpower = calc(right,i);
		
		if(ipower == n || tpower == n){
			f=1;
			break;
		}
		
	}
	
	if(f){
		cout<<"YES\n";
	}
	else
	cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}
